snippet: As the holder since Sunday of all four grand slam titles, Novak Djokovic has no equal in tennis, but as an artist he isn't quite up to scratch -- or so said perennial Roland Garros favorite Gustavo Kuerten....
lead_paragraph: As the holder since Sunday of all four grand slam titles, Novak Djokovic has no equal in tennis, but as an artist he isn't quite up to scratch -- or so said perennial Roland Garros favorite Gustavo Kuerten.

headline.print_headline: Nice One, but You Can Do Better, Kuerten Tells 'Heartist' Djokovic
headline.main: Nice One, but You Can Do Better, Kuerten Tells 'Heartist' Djokovic
